com.threecrickets.prudence.util
Class ResolvingTemplate

java.lang.Object
  org.restlet.routing.Template
      com.threecrickets.prudence.util.ResolvingTemplate

public class ResolvingTemplate
extends Template

A Template that allows control over which Resolver instances it will use.

Author:
Tal Liron

The class must have have a constructor that accepts a Map argument.
